channel.title: Unarmed Weapons [Fixed]
channel.description:
[size=12pt][color=orange]The client I downloaded already has vesta's, statius and etc but they did not have specials or correct target slots. I added the specials but when I equip them it still says "Unarmed" and shows no special bar.
In my ItemAssistant.java, I have these which I believe should set the Interface. [/size]
[code=java5]} else if (WeaponName2.startsWith("spear")) { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 4679); //lunge, swipe, pound, block c.getPA().sendFrame246(4680, 200, Weapon); c.getPA().sendFrame126(WeaponName, 4682);[/code]
[size=12pt]Also, I checked my clients itemDef.java it has no ints or anything to include these items. I was wondering maybe it could be due to that reason.[/size]

item.title: Unarmed Weapons [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:541630”][quote author=Get Blitz link=topic=660502.msg4416287#msg4416287 date=1396059229]

If it says unarmed, it’s because the item isn’t in the item.cfg

In there already
[/quote]
Is it only showing “Unarmed” in the combat tab? Try getting the shop value for the item via trying to sell or trying to buy. If it says unarmed there it’s an issue with the item.cfg if it says the actual name, then your combat tab isn’t sending the name to the client.[/quote]

Yeah it shows up as “unarmed” in the shop but it is already in item.cfg so I don’t know what the problem is.

EDIT: I fixed it by replacing my item.cfg, I don’t know what was wrong with the older one but it works now. Thank you for your help!

Read full topic

item.title: Unarmed Weapons [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461

@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:5, topic:541630”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=660502.msg4416275#msg4416275 date=1396058627]
If it says unarmed, it’s because the item isn’t in the item.cfg
[/quote]

In there already[/quote]
Is it only showing “Unarmed” in the combat tab? Try getting the shop value for the item via trying to sell or trying to buy. If it says unarmed there it’s an issue with the item.cfg if it says the actual name, then your combat tab isn’t sending the name to the client.

item.title: Unarmed Weapons [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

No, There is no array for weapon however there are for helmets, bodys and etc also I already got the special attacks and frames figured out sorry I forgot to point that out.

Read full topic

item.title: Unarmed Weapons [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

The slots are probably handled in a collection of arrays, ie weaponIds = { … }, just add the new ids to their respective arrays (or however it is handled). As for special attacks, you’ll need to handle the effects yourself, send the frames and call your own special attack function.

Read full topic
